nodeList.description: Poison and other ailments inflicted by Aura of Decay last longer. This does not include ailments that slow.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [15%] increased duration of poison and other non-slowing ailments inflicted by Aura of Decay

node.description: Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies more frequently, but poison is applied to your self more and more frequently as time goes on.
node.nodeDescription:
Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies 50% more frequently.

The rate at which Aura of Decay poisons you accelerates over time, increasing by 5% each second.

node.altText: Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies and lasts for 0.5 to 0.9 seconds. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.

node.description: You have additional posion resistance while in Aura of Decay and you have increased health regeneration if you have deactivated Aura of Decay recently (past 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: Gain [40%] increased health regeneration per point if you have deactivated aura of decay recently.

node.description: Aura of Decay affects a larger area.

nodeList.description: Your chance to cast {Soul Feast} when hit increases each time you fail to cast Soul Feast.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Each time you fail to cast Soul Feast, the current chance is increased by 10% of what it already is.

node.altText: Soul Feast is a spell that hits all cursed enemies, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their the souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

node.nodeDescription: Gain [40%] increased health regeneration per point if you have deactivated aura of decay recently.

node.description: Aura of Decay affects a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: [15%] increased area affected per point
Toggle an aura which poisons yourself and nearby enemies more every second.

node.altText: Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies and lasts for 0.5 to 0.9 seconds. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.
node.description: Nearby enemies have a chance to be feared when you activate Aura of Decay.
node.nodeDescription: [34#] chance to fear nearby enemies when you activate Aura of Decay

node.description: Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies more frequently, but poison is applied to your self more and more frequently as time goes on.
node.nodeDescription:
Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies 50% more frequently.

The rate at which Aura of Decay poisons you accelerates over time, increasing by 5% each second.

node.description: Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies more frequently.
node.nodeDescription: Aura of Decay applies poison and other ailments to enemies [8%] more frequently per point
Toggle an aura which poisons yourself and nearby enemies more every second.

stats.statName: Poison Resistance in Aura of Decay
